node.excerpt: It draws primarily on musical and cultural sources from the 1980s and early 1990s while also being associated with an ambiguous or satirical…

frontmatter.title: Vaporwave
frontmatter.description: I think the most trendy is the oldest. Vaporwave is an Internet-based microgenre that was built upon the experimental and ironic tendencies of genres such as chillwave and hypnagogic pop.
